Subject: RE: STORE Renovation - Frederic Malle Dubai Mall on Monday on 30th Jun 2025

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  “Frederic Malle Dubai Mall last trading date on Mon 30th  Jun 2025 

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Cean Llamas <mailto:Cean.Llamas@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 30th Jun.  @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Advice where it will be transferred  @simona <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com>  
*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 2nd Jul before trading hours

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a store closure for Renovation of  “Frederic Malle Dubai Mall last trading date on Mon 30th  Jun 2025 

 

You are kindly requested to complete your tasks for smooth closure and arrange the store closure needs as per the individual tasks within the given time frame,

*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation at the earliest to store email to apply for permits.
*	Create a Return to warehouse by @Cean Llamas <mailto:Cean.Llamas@chalhoub.com>  and create an appointment/ ASN request trough one reach for all merchandising.
*	Apply for Work Mall/police permit (return stocks, transfer / stock packing/ IT Equipment) @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different bag on 30th Jun.  @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Credit card machine with manual invoice book to be transferred through Focus request non stock to Ghouse khan @FredericMalle Dubaimall <mailto:FredericMalle.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Fredierico Mojica <mailto:Fredierico.Mojica@chalhoub.com> 
*	Store phone devices/I pads if available to be transferred to Advice where it will be transferred  @simona <mailto:Florian.Cottone@chalhoub.com>  
*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> please ensure all CCTV camera and NVR is dismantled on 2nd Jul before trading hours
